text: was a Japanese actress. She was most known for voicing the character of Bulma (Dragon Ball) for over 31 years. She was born in Hokkaido, Japan. She was also known for her roles as Ukyo Kuonji (Ranma Â½), Dokin-chan (Soreike! Anpanman), Madoka Ayukawa (Kimagure Orange Road), Miyuki Kashima (Miyuki), Reiko Mikami (Ghost Sweeper Mikami), Meryl Strife (Trigun) and Naomi Hunter (Metal Gear Solid series). Tsuru died of an aortic dissection in Tokyo, Japan on November 16, 2017 at the age of 57. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from aortic dissection Category:Japanese movie actors Category:Japanese television actors Category:Japanese voice actors
title: Hiromi Tsuru
